DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to examine the interactions between buprenorphine and naltrexone, and to assess how they may directly impact the clinical issues involving: transferring patients from buprenorphine to naltrexone, developing a non-abusable form of buprenorphine, and enhancing patient acceptability of naltrexone.
DOC.brief_title: Buprenorphine Pharmacology Related to Addiction Treatment - 18
